form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 11-26-79) N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43.K0079 FEE STAMP N. APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: 3-24-83 IMMIGRATION AND INATURALIZATION SERVICE 9:10 X C ALIEN REGISTRATION Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name LE, THIN THI TYPE.) No. A 21206025 Section of Law Date: 12-23-80 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is THIN THI LE ( Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 202 SAND BERG ST (Number and street, ) THO USAND OAKS VENTURA , CA 91360 (City, county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 06-21-15 in HANOI VIET NAM (Month) (Day) (Year) City or town) County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to NONE (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No 302 (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 06 - 13 - 75 under the name of (Month) (Day) (Year) LE, THIN THi at Los ANGELES CA (City) (State) (11) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA where I now live since JUNE 75 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 60 months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 10/20 1978 PRESENT TIME 202 SANDBERG ST. THOUSAND OAKS CALIF, (b) 02/16 1976 10 1978 825 CALLE HAYA #8 02 THOUSAND OAKS CALIF (c) JULY 19.75 1976 8422 GRIME CYN Rd. MOORPARK CALIF (d) JUNE 19.75 JULY 1975 HOPE VILLAGE WEIMAR WEIMAR CALIF (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES NONE Form N-400 (Rev. 11-26-79)7 30th (OVER) (1)
